title: Lewis N. Clark Supplies Gear to Adventures Accessed
text:
Travel and outdoor brand gives equipment to organization that encourages those living in the Chicago area to take outdoor adventures.
Elk Grove Village, IL (PRWEB) October 12, 2015
LCI Brands is proud to supply Lewis N. Clark gear to help people in the Chicago area get outside.
“Lewis N. Clark is a Chicago-based brand rooted in adventure travel. We might not have mountains in our backyard, but we have miles of Midwestern prairie land, natural dell rock formations to climb, and rivers to paddle. Adventures Accessed works to get Chicago natives outside to enjoy these natural landscapes and Lewis N. Clark is happy to sponsor them with the right gear to make the most of their trips,” said Jen Panattoni, Director of Marketing.
Aaron Wolf founded Adventures Accessed after discovering that he didn’t like working in noisy downtown Chicago. However, he also learned that many people did not have the ability to leave the city or own the proper outdoor equipment. “So I took those issues and purchased a ton of gear, a 12 passenger van, got outfitter and guide permits and am trying to eliminate the stigma that there is nothing to see in the Midwest,” he said.
Some of the organization’s trips include whitewater rafting, sustainable farming, horseback riding, backpacking, and overnight adventures like meteor shower watching. It also offers services for corporate teams, youth groups, and spiritual organizations. Individuals are welcome to Create Your Own Trip (C.Y.O.T.) as well.
Currently, Adventures Accessed leads trips throughout Illinois, Wisconsin, Indiana, and Michigan. “There are forest systems that span acres in the hundreds of thousands with more trails and lakes to see in a decade. Bears, eagles, otters, fruit and herbs are abundant in areas of the Midwest but no one really thinks to look here for them,” Wolf added.
Individuals interested in planning an outdoor trip are encouraged to contact Adventures Accessed .
About LCI Brands
LCI Brands (formerly known as L.C. Industries, Inc.) is located just outside Chicago and is home to brands such as Lewis N. Clark® and UrbanGear. With the luggage caddy as its core offering, LCI Brands began operations in 1971, and since then has expanded to offer hundreds of products in categories such as security, comfort, organization, and health. For more information, visit http://www.lcibrands.com .
